title: Greek chicken pitta pockets
ingredients: ['675g (1½lb) skinless, boneless chicken breasts', '4 tbsp instant polenta', '½ tsp onion powder', '1 tsp paprika', '1 tsp cumin seeds', 'pepper to taste', '2 tbsp olive oil', '4 pitta breads, wholemeal or white', '115g (4oz) mixed herb salad leaves', 'For the sauce', '7.5cm (3in) piece cucumber, grated', '225g (8oz) plain low-fat yoghurt', '1 large garlic clove, crushed', '1 tsp mint sauce', '1 tbsp chopped fresh mint']
